full_text:
Fwd: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
From: [redacted]
To: [redacted]
Date: 2019/07/08 08:24
Subject: Fwd: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
Attachments: TEXT.htm

[redacted] @bop.gov> 7/7/2019 6:22 PM >>>
I have verified [redacted] is an attorney in good standing in Massachusetts. He is permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein.

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------Original message------
From: [redacted] (USANYS)* [redacted] @usdoj.gov>
Date: 7/7/19 6:18 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [redacted] @bop.gov> [redacted] @bop.gov>
Subject: RE: counsel having difficulty meeting with client

>>> [redacted] (USANYS)* 07/07/2019 18:18 >>>
Massachusetts

From: [redacted] @bop.gov>
Sent: Sunday, July 07, 2019 18:18
To: [redacted] @bop.gov (USANYS) [redacted] @usa.doj.gov>
Subject: Re: counsel having difficulty meeting with client

Sorry [redacted], just seeing this now. Where is he barred?

Sent from my Verizon, Samsung Galaxy smartphone

------Original message------
From: [redacted] (USANYS)* [redacted] @usdoj.gov<mailto:[redacted] @usdoj.gov>>
Date: 7/7/19 5:36 PM (GMT-05:00)
To: [redacted] @bop.gov<mailto:[redacted] @bop.gov>> [redacted] @bop.gov<mailto:[redacted] @bop.gov>>
Subject: RE: counsel having difficulty meeting with client

>>> [redacted] (USANYS)* 07/07/2019 17:36 >>>
[redacted]
With apologies for the weekend email, we have a defendant, Jeffrey Epstein, who was arrested last night and is currently being detained at MCC, and is expected to be pres of-state.

We're concerned about the defendant not having access to his attorney in advance of the presentment (as we would be for any defendant) and so I wanted to reach out to thanks very much,
[redacted]

Page 10405
DOJ-OGR-00023925

text_blocks.content:
Fwd: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
From: [redacted]
To: [redacted]
Date: 2019/07/08 08:24
Subject: Fwd: counsel having difficulty meeting with client
Attachments: TEXT.htm

[redacted] @bop.gov> 7/7/2019 6:22 PM >>>
I have verified [redacted] is an attorney in good standing in Massachusetts. He is permitted to visit Jeffrey Epstein.

With apologies for the weekend email, we have a defendant, Jeffrey Epstein, who was arrested last night and is currently being detained at MCC, and is expected to be pres of-state.

We're concerned about the defendant not having access to his attorney in advance of the presentment (as we would be for any defendant) and so I wanted to reach out to thanks very much,
[redacted]

additional_notes: The document is an email chain discussing issues related to Jeffrey Epstein's detention and access to his attorney. Multiple names and email addresses have been redacted.
